formattedAddress: 1441 York Ave, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1441 York Ave, New York, NY 10075-2522, USA

originalText.text: The level of service provided by Timothy at John’s Cleaners is unparalleled. He goes above and beyond to take care of his clients. I’ve had multiple rush orders taken care of on short notice in a reasonable time. No other dry cleaner I’d recommend!

text.text: The level of service provided by Timothy at John’s Cleaners is unparalleled. He goes above and beyond to take care of his clients. I’ve had multiple rush orders taken care of on short notice in a reasonable time. No other dry cleaner I’d recommend!

originalText.text: This place is absolutely fantastic! They have very quick turnaround and are usually always on time. Doing my laundry at the self-service laundromats always left my clothes with a bunch of holes in them and a musty smell. Since I've started using John's Cleaners, I don't have anymore holes and my clothes smell so much fresher. It's also pure magic how they're able to fold my clothes so neatly/compactly and it makes it very easy for me to put them away in my closet. Also, they're always very friendly and make an effort to remember my name, so I really appreciated that. :D

originalText.text: John’s cleaners is the best dry cleaner I’ve ever used not just in NYC but anywhere ever! Ok sounds unreasonable, I mean do you ever think much of your dry cleaner (no offense). Well Timothy and his team are amazing. Be it keeping a bottle on hand of our favorite baby detergent for our little ones laundry (and yes ghey kept it while we were in Canada for 6mo). Dropping off our cleaning right to our apartment, texting us to let us know when things have been dropped off while we are away staying open a couple of minutes late so we can get them our clothes or holiday texts… you name it. This isn’t just a great dry cleaner but a great customer first, caring small local business that deserves your patronage. Try them out I’m really glad we did!

originalText.text: Location isn't everything when it comes to dry cleaning/laundry service. Tim and the John's Cleaner's crew provide exceptional service. Not only are they helpful & flexible, but they treat clothing with exceptional care. They understand the intrinsic value of items, and treat them as if they were their own. In 4 years I've never had an issue, nor have had to ask twice in terms of any specifications. Additionally, they're a big part of the neighborhood on the UES. Whether its helping carry heavy bags upstairs for some of their less capable clients or pushing through an emergency cleaning situation, they're willing to go the extra mile without question or expectation. The value in a trusted business like theirs is immeasurable.

originalText.text: John's Cleaners has been wonderful.  They offer excellent laundering services, and their customer service is excellent and always courteous.  They are even offering service during the COVID-19 pandemic. The only reason we stopped using them was because we moved to Hell's Kitchen.
